reviews.text: What a trip, had an amazing time! The staff were brilliant and good fun. The food was nice and we visited some amazing spots, it was a good laugh living on a boat for 2 days. Our amazing Crew were Fi and Chris oh and Tony.
reviews.author: Customer

reviews.text: Amazing 2 days trip, good food, breathtaking views and snorkeling. The lookout on the white heaven was simply incredible.Special mention to Chris, Conrad and Tony that made the cruise even better.I would 100% recommend !

reviews.text: We had a lovely trip. It was definitely the highlight of my 4 months east coast trip. We swam with turtles, saw sharks and stingrays, snorkeled with fishes bigger than myself,â€¦ The crew was very very nice and the captain showed us a special place and told us the aboriginal history of the place. I would definitely recommend it!!
